Docs.summary: Marks an API as internal to Entity Framework Core. These APIs are not subject to the same compatibility standards as public APIs. It may be changed or removed without notice in any release. You should only use such APIs directly in your code with extreme caution and knowing that doing so can result in application failures when updating to a new Entity Framework Core release.
